bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REVOLVING CREDIT PRODUCT OFFER CUSTOMIZATION

abstract.p: A system and method are disclosed for making an offer for at least one revolving credit product to an applicant. An identifier for each of a plurality of revolving credit products is stored and at least one attribute (145) is associated with each of the revolving credit products. An application for a revolving credit product is received from an applicant (105). One or more of the revolving credit product issuer's (160) objectives are identified. A set of revolving credit products that fit within an applicant profile is created, ranked, and at least one of the top ranking revolving credit products are then offered to the applicant from the set of revolving credit products.

applicant-name.name: ARGUS INFORMATION AND ADVISORY SERVICES, LLC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR REVOLVING CREDIT PRODUCT OFFER CUSTOMIZATION
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE PERMETTANT DE PERSONNALISER DES OFFRES DE PRODUIT A CREDIT RENOUVELABLE

abstract.p: A system and method are disclosed for making an offer for at least one revolving credit product to an applicant. An identifier for each of a plurality of revolving credit products is stored and at least one attribute (145) is associated with each of the revolving credit products. An application for a revolving credit product is received from an applicant (105). One or more of the revolving credit product issuer's (160) objectives are identified. A set of revolving credit products that fit within an applicant profile is created, ranked, and at least one of the top ranking revolving credit products are then offered to the applicant from-the set of revolving credit products.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé permettant de faire une offre à un candidat concernant au moins un produit à crédit renouvelable. Un identificateur est stocké pour chaque produit à crédit renouvelable et au moins un attribut (145) est associé à chaque produit à crédit renouvelable. Une demande de produit à crédit renouvelable est reçue d'un candidat (105). Un ou plusieurs des objectifs de l'émetteur (160) du produit à crédit renouvelable sont identifiés. Une série de produits à crédit renouvelable qui cadrent avec le profil d'un candidat est créée, classée et au moins un des produits à crédit renouvelable les mieux classés est ensuite proposé au candidat parmi la série de produits à crédit renouvelable.
